channel.title: How can i raise Pkp and Slayer points?
channel.description: How can I raise Pkp per kill? and Points per slayer task..? Please help out :'(

item.title: How can i raise Pkp and Slayer points?
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

for the slayer points go to npchandler.java and search :-

public void appendSlayerExperience

it will be there, just look for your slayer points and increase them, for the pkp ill edit soon

edit: for pkp go to playerassistant.java and search for this:-

public void applyDead

then change the points

edit: randqm he doesnt know where they are added thats why he asked, dont post pointless posts for post count idiot.
it should be under this :-
c.killerId

Read full topic
item.source: How can i raise Pkp and Slayer points?

item.title: How can i raise Pkp and Slayer points?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

run3scap3_uk:

It was already added when I got source… :S

I mean you have to search like when do the points get added?
If you get a point when killing some one,
then search in your source where that is located and there will be a code which makes increase the pkpoints
so you just adjust the value that it adds more
